data.name: Zniw Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Inspired by adventure games and edutainment titles from our youth, Zniw Adventure is a traditional, 2D point and click adventure game featuring cartoon comic-styled graphics, classic frame-by-frame animation, lots of dinosaurs and other prehistoric creatures, and educational aspects.



Her mother's hatchday is just around the corner and Zniw, a young, yellow, female dinosaur, tries to find the ultimate gift! However, due to some unfortunate events, Zniw ends up far, far away from her hometown of Wajapulka. Now, armed with a sharp tongue, lack of navigational skills, and some knowledge from travel brochures, Zniw is desperately trying to find her way home... When she accidentally stumbles in on a major problem in the neighbouring village!

So how about it, will you help Zniw on her journey?



  • Oldschool 4:3 cartoon visuals, featuring hand-drawn backgrounds and traditional frame-by-frame animation.
  • Educational encyclopaedia, with descriptions of encountered prehistoric creatures, items, locations, and more.
  • No gore, blood, bad language, or anything like that. Fun for the entire family!
  • More than 20 different dinosaurs and other prehistoric creatures to meet along the way.
  • Several locations to explore, including forests, jungles, caves, and more.
  • Unlockable rewards that include concept art and minigames.

data.short_description: Zniw Adventure is a 2D, traditionally animated point and click adventure game with educational content, starring a young, yellow, female dinosaur having all sorts of adventures in the prehistoric land of Polisemia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A DirectX 9.0/OpenGL compatible card with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Sound card and a mouse/touchpad/trackball are required. The minimum requirements may vary between the rendering/scaling methods used.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32/64-bit
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible card, with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installed sound card drivers and a mouse/touchpad/trackball are required. The minimum requirements may vary between the rendering/scaling methods used.
